lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: I'm thankful for my job, and am so happy to join a worldwide network of people making jobs for themselves possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in New York City, at a cooperatively run grocery store, owned by more than 15,000 working members.  We keep our prices very low because our members do most of the labor at our Coop (that keeps our expenses much lower than most stores).  In order to shop here, you must be a member and to be a member, you have to agree to work for 2.75 hours once every 4 weeks.  I am one of only 65 paid staff people and I help to coordinate the labor, answer member questions, I perform administrative jobs like process the payroll, and a lot of other information management.

lenders.name: andre
lenders.loan_because: 1 year ago I started a business credit mobile phone ownership with capital loaned by a friend, 4 months running a successful business, been running 5 to start a business due to bad debts distracted from its consumers. now I am confused and a lot of debt to return the money that I borrow from a friend. I have been trying to sell my motorcycle, but less than sufficient funds to restore the money that I borrow from a friend. but I do not give up because I want to start a new business that is a distributor of rice, and I need a capital of Rp. 25,000,000, or approximately USD $ 2500 to start this business. I currently have 3 people brother who is still only school while my mother worked as a factory worker, while my father unemployment. I already 2 months this is not  worked and threatened the sack from work because of corporate efficiency. Now I hope there is a benefactor willing to give loans that will change the very meaning of life for my family and start a beautiful life.
lenders.occupational_info: For the rice distribution business that will I do, I already have a partner working in Klaten as rice, while my job is looking for buyers and deliver the order to the buyer until the rice. capital needed to rent a truck and operational, for a while, I will rent a truck and I hope that if the business is running smoothly within 1 year I can already buy their own trucks for this business

We are so thankful for all the help we have been given along life’s path and are so happy we are able to help others with their dreams!! Thank you Kiva for making this happen.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of the details and paperwork for my office, reports, travel arrangements and so forth.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I am thrilled to have an opportunity to help the less fortunate!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I do research in Solar Energy

lenders.name: Moriya
lenders.loan_because: it takes a village.

lenders.name: Rahil
lenders.loan_because: I know how tough it can be to start a business and these micro loans help people who are trying to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the President/CEO of Pirani Marketing Group.  I work with small to mid-size business create a marketing strategy, produce collateral, and help them succeed!

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to survive!
lenders.occupational_info: I help the sick and dying.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other families
lenders.occupational_info: I am 4 years old and go to school

lenders.name: Tracee
lenders.loan_because: Small steps, taken often enough, go a long way.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: In hard times people need to get REALLY generous.
lenders.occupational_info: I study how people use softwares, in order to make computers more easy and useful.

lenders.name: Sofia
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to impact the world. I believe that empowering people to change their world will ultimately change mine.

lenders.name: Scott & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: The tasks before us seem less daunting when we stop and remember we can all lend a hand, one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Sarah tries to protect lenders from writing bad real estate loans that will eventually lead to foreclosures. Scott tries to keep people in their homes if borrowers do end up in foreclosure. We are all in this together.

lenders.name: Mandi
lenders.loan_because: our family has been blessed and we would like to share this with those less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I create custom jewelry where I transform personal photographs into pendants to wear on necklaces and bracelets.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because:
My $25 loan can really help make a difference to someone who wants to improve his or her quality of life.

Kiva also allows for the cycle of giving to continue. Once my loan has been repaid, I can then loan again. I respect this organizational model.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an academic librarian at a community college in the Midwest.

lenders.name: DanaMichelle
lenders.loan_because: I am greatful for what I have and I hope to help others reach their dreams.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I believe people generally are good and want to do good and be productive members of society.  Sometimes they just need a little help to do that and I am currently in a position to provide that help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a major bank.  My role is to redeploy our workforce into areas within the bank that need their skills and experience.  We want to keep  and retain our employees because they have the right experience and skills and they already know the company culture.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I hope it's an effective way to use the money to improve the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I create systems that help people to use computers in their businesses.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Everyone deserves a chance, an opportunity to make their life better.

lenders.name: joy
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate by a friend and love the idea of people helping people who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint in watercolor and sell my work at street shows, through my website, via reps and directly at my studio in Cambidge, MA.

lenders.name: Marla Mac
lenders.occupation: Money Coach and Certified Cash Flow Specialist
lenders.loan_because: I'm giving a hand up over a handout. I love playing a part in Kiva's mission to end poverty by helping people (especially women) start their own business!
lenders.occupational_info: Speaker, Money Coach and Certified Cash Flow Specialist at Healthy Wallet

lenders.name: Rachana
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves the opportunity to take control of their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I take what business users need and translate that into something a computer programmer could develop

lenders.name: Bob, Irene & Claire
lenders.loan_because: Giving for the joy of it!  If one needs moral or ethical reasons I recommend Peter Singer's "The Life You Can Save".
lenders.occupational_info:
Bob: I study lakes - especially salty ones!
Irene: I study plants & water
Claire: I'm in school.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct legal but non religious weddings and funerals in Scotland

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: 1. We are loved. 2. It ain't mine anyhoo. 3. What I share I receive more of. 4. What I receive, I share more of. :-) Woo HOOO!
lenders.occupational_info: I apply myself in accordance with the will of God for the love of my fellow beings and the joy of doing it. I am a technologist with extensive experience in building successful global organizations.

lenders.name: Global Village Design
lenders.loan_because: others need the money more than i do....
lenders.occupational_info: I create web sites using computers that are powered by electricity created from wind. I give discounts to organizations that I believe are trying to make the world better for its citizens. I donate a portion of the business proceeds to organizations such as this one....

lenders.name: Delia
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of my spare cash helping other people in far-off parts of the world. It  makes one feel part of a world community, informs about other peoples lives and concerns and adds interest to my life.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: I see the work that Kiva facilitates in developing countries as a vital tool in the enrichment and enfranchisement of people and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise funds for charitable organizations that enables them to carry out the important work they do for people and society.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: Peter Unger's "Living High and Letting Die"

lenders.name: amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women thrive. When women thrive, children thrive, and when children thrive communities thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I push a bunch of papers around in order to appear busy :)

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because:
The Bible, 1 John 3:18 NRSV
"Let us love, not in word or speech, but in truth and action."
